price: 23.(Malaggii) la xidhiidhayna wuxuu odhan: Kani waa waxa agteyda ku diyaarka ah.
arabic: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَٰذَا مَا لَدَيَّ عَتِيدٌ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqāla qarīnuhu hādhā mā ladayya ʿatīdun
